item.description:
Let's head out to Goshen for the CT Wine Festival. Here's what they have to say on their website: Taste the best of Connecticut’s wineries. Sample locally produced specialty foods. Enjoy live music. Browse for handicrafts. And more. It’s all happening at the Connecticut Wine Festival.

Advance tickets are $25, and then $30 when you get there. You can buy them here: https://www.paypal.com/us/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_flow&SESSION=P6_bSRj2KuErf9jN87qq1rXRh8QORhOPx7TtZEGGOoo7yFXz_XhyR5Kh7pG&dispatch=50a222a57771920b6a3d7b606239e4d529b525e0b7e69bf0224adecfb0124e9b61f...

Let's figure out carpooling. Designated driver tickets are only $10, and the same for anyone under 21 if you want to bring family. No pets allowed. And you can also buy your advance tickets at one of these wineries:

Sunset Meadow Vineyards, Goshen, CT
Jones Winery, Shelton, CT
Taylor Brooke Winery, Woodstock, CT
Miranda Vineyard, Goshen, CT
Gouveia Vineyards, Wallingford, CT
Hopkins Vineyard, Warren, CT
Sharpe Hill Vineyard, Pomfret, CT

group.name: Eat, Laugh, and Be Merry in West Hartford

item.name: CT Wine Festival in Goshen Sunday July 29th
